name: Dealer's Smoke Break
description:
This is a little Solitaire game I made in an afternoon (and then got obsessed with and playtested it nonstop with the help of some close friends for several weeks). The whole conceit is you can play it with just your hands, no table required, which has made it my go-to transit activity as I try and stop staring at my little computerized death box so much.

DM me if you get a -2 and I'll add your name to this page! 

CURRENT -2 CHAMPIONS:
Lauren Soumilas (world first baybeee!)
Phyrex Hasten
